Igniting Insight ‚Äî What Exactly Is Why‚ÄëFires?

A full‚Äëstack, open‚Äësource web platform that transforms raw satellite fire detections into interactive stories, statistics, and forecasts. Built for researchers, analysts, policy‚Äëmakers, and the simply curious, it turns NASA FIRMS MODIS &¬†VIIRS hotspots (2001‚Äëpresent) into meaningful narratives.
